DOC.brief_summary: Addition Heparin Catheter Lock Solution ( CLS ) : Taurolock-TM improve vascular patency compare Taurolock-TM alone , hemodialysis patient Tunneled Cuffed Catheter ( TCC ) vascular access .
DOC.brief_title: Addition Heparin Taurolock-TM CLS HD Patients With TCC Dose Improve Catheter Patency Problems ?
DOC.detailed_description: Bacteremia thrombosis major complication TCC use hemodialysis.Instilation CLS contain antibiotic-anticoagulant solution end dialysis session till next dialysis , prevent Catheter relate bacteremia ( CRB ) .In previous study department , Taurolock-TM decrease rate CRB increase incidence catheter malfunction . The aim study investigate influence Heparin addition CLS-Taurolock- TM ( Taurolidine & citrate 4 % ) prevention catheter patency problem HD patient TCC , addition CRB prevention . Methods : Patients newly insert TCC HD enrol randomize receive one three CLS type : group 1- Taurolock-TM , Group 2 - Taurolock-TM Heparin , Group 3- Heparin .Patients follow 6 monthes . The objective study investigate effect Taurolock TM heparin rate CRB vascular patency .
DOC.criteria: Hemodialysis patient new TCC Informed Consent
